entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is described as someone who is being threatened by Black and is trying to get help from Remus. He is mentioned as having been waiting for 12 years for this moment.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is described as someone who has come to try and kill Pettigrew again, and is mentioned as having killed Lily and James. He is also described as having fathomless eyes.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as someone who is trying to calm down Pettigrew and help him, and is mentioned as being skeptical of Pettigrew's claims about Black.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is described as someone who Pettigrew is trying to get help from, but Lupin corrects him and says it's actually Sirius (Black) he needs to talk to.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a prison where Sirius was being held, but somehow managed to break out of with the help of dark powers.

entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is mentioned as someone who taught Sirius some tricks to help him break out of Azkaban.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who broke out of Azkaban with the help of dark powers, and is also referred to by his nickname 'Black'.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as someone who was killed by Black along with Lily.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as someone who was killed by Black along with James.
